Title: A young propaganda troupe
Designer: Cheng Guoquan (成国权)Ye Hongxiang (叶洪祥)
Publisher: Hebei renmin meishu chubanshe (河北人民美术出版社), Beijing
Notes: Children making propaganda for the extermination of the Four Pests, pictured on the banner: flies, mosquitoes, rats and bugs. The latter replaced the original Fourth Pest, sparrows, after these had been largely exterminated with disastrous ecological results.
